div.p: Einstein Charter Schools seeks to ensure that our program serves teachers, administrators and students from underrepresented groups. All meetings are held in handicap accessible areas and persons concerned should contact us at 504.503.0470 to make special arrangements.

p.strong: Einstein Charter School Village de l’Est

div.p:
Einstein Charter School Sherwood Forest
4801 Maid Marion
New Orleans, LA 70128
504-503-0110
